channel.title: HELP i have a confusing error with java!
channel.description:
ok well once i was trying to fix the cannot find path error you know. so i changed the path in my java and heres what happened when i tried to open any kind of client: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
I was like wtf. so i was gonna change the path back but im confused. can anyone help?

item.title: HELP i have a confusing error with java!
item.dc:creator: @XxHatredxX XxHatredxX
item.description:
@XxHatredxX wrote:

im kinda dumb too…it took me a week to figure out than u cant run the server in RAR files…(and it still isnt running)

so is it in rar files?
if so…then take them out…
and try to run it…

if it isnt…right click on
what you are trying to run and change the path…like…here is an example.

this is run.cmd

@echo off
cd ../bin
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

see where it says "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0_12\ ?

where it says : jdk.1.6.0_…\ ?
then put ur version of JDK in there… in my case…as u can see. is jdk.1.6.0_12
if that didnt help…pm me

Read full topic
